issue.title: [C++] Make it easier to create vectors of move-only data types for tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11998](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11998). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We take advantage of aggregate initialization in our tests in a number of places.


Also for consideration: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/8468774/can-i-list-initialize-a-vector-of-move-only-type
